cu.explanation_en: Setting Num_Threads_PUSCH to zero will disable PUSCH processing threads, causing uplink data transmission failures.

du.explanation_en: Setting nr_cellid to zero will cause cell identification conflicts and prevent proper network attachment.
du.explanation_zh: 將 nr_cellid 設定為零將導致小區識別衝突，並阻止正確的網路連接。
